name: Andy Weir
bio: Andy Weir is an American author and software engineer. He is best known for his science fiction novel The Martian, which was published in 2011 and became a New York Times bestseller. The Martian was later adapted into a film of the same name, directed by Ridley Scott and starring Matt Damon.

name: Gabrielle Zevin
bio: Gabrielle Zevin is an American author and screenwriter. She is best known for her science fiction novel Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, which was published in 2021 and became a New York Times bestseller. The book was later adapted into a film of the same name, directed by Olivia Wilde and starring Tessa Thompson, Margot Robbie, and Carey Mulligan.

name: V.E. Schwab
bio: V.E. Schwab is an American author and screenwriter. She is best known for her science fiction novel The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue, which was published in 2020 and became a New York Times bestseller. The book was later adapted into a film of the same name, directed by Max Barbakow and starring Gal Gadot, Rege-Jean Page, and Will Poulter.
